The deputy clerk hereby certifies that on 10/13/2017, a copy of this order was served by sending it via first-class mail to the address of each non-CM/ECF user listed on the Notice of Electronic Filing. (tmiS, COURT STAFF) (Filed on 10/13/2017)

ORDER REASSIGNING CASE. Case Reassigned to Judge Vince Chhabria. Magistrate Judge Laurel Beeler no longer assigned to the case. This case is assigned to a judge who participates in the Cameras in the Courtroom Pilot Project. See General Order 65 and http://cand.uscourts.gov/cameras. Signed by Executive Committee on 10/13/17. (Attachments: # (1) Notice of Eligibility for Video Recording)(as, COURT STAFF) (Filed on 10/13/2017)

REASSIGNED CASE - NOTICE OF NEW HEARING DATE: You are notified that the Court has scheduled an Initial Case Management Conference before Judge Vince Chhabria upon reassignment. For a copy of Judge Chhabria's Standing Order and other information, please refer to the Court's website at www.cand.uscourts.gov. Case Management Statement due by 12/12/2017. Initial Case Management Conference set for 12/19/2017 01:30 PM in Courtroom 4, 17th Floor, San Francisco. The deputy clerk hereby certifies that on 10/25/2017, a copy of this order was served by sending it via first-class mail to the address of each non-CM/ECF user listed on the Notice of Electronic Filing.
